name: Stick Figure Slam Dunk
description:
Stick Figure Slam Dunk - JAM IT!

NO ADS • NO MICROTRANSACTIONS • ALWAYS

Unleash your best dunking skills in this high-flying slamming challenge. Get running, take off, trick out, and throw it down.

Take the DUNK CHALLENGE and test your skills with a survival test of throwing down mean dunks and flips in fun challenge tasks!

Elevate and detonate! Send your stick figure flying down the runway and lifting off over props such as cones, parking meters or the dreaded chainlink fence.

Practice your skills for the Dunk Challenge in Free play, earn points by swiping mid air to do crazy flips and techy tricks; combine them with the challenge of the props to earn an even bigger score.

Can you complete the manic madness of the dunk challenge? Can you earn a score in the elite 400 club?

Get on the court and throw it down today!
